item.title: History of World Cinema
item.description: The Oxford History of World Cinema - Geoffrey Nowell Smith introduction began as a novelty in gew big cities - New York, Paris, London, Berlin

item.title: Kuleshov effect
item.description: named after Lev Kuleshov, Russian director 1910s important editing style; it says that viewers derive more meaning from the interaction of two sequential shots than from a single shot in isolation

item.title: History of Cinema
item.description: Kinethoscope - Einstein First 30 years -> consolidation of [[History of Indian Cinema]]

item.title: History of Indian Cinema
item.description: 19th century Lumiere Brothers first movie in India shot by Save Dada Inspired and first motion picture - The Wrestlers

item.title: Schindler's List
item.description: Director - Steven Spielberg Year - 1993 Plot Story of [[Oskar Schindler]] - how he redeems himself - German patriot and Nazi supporter to someone who uses his operations and business to save as many Jews as possible
